name: PANIC ATTACK 1. TERRESTRIAL PARADISE
description: PANIC ATTACK series (1/4) 4 unique pieces of "PANIC ATTACK", the most recent Pussy Riot's activist audio-visual artwork. The VERY first Pussy Riot's NFT drop. Pussy Riot's art was named by The Guardian among the best art pieces of the 21st century, Pussy Riot was named "Women of the year" (2012) by TIME magazine. "TERRESTRIAL PARADISE" depicts an innocent, happy, utopian, kawaii world, where a hu(wo)man is still in peace and harmony with the environment.
